subject: Re: [junit] Junit Training
msgSnippet: ... I provide on-site JUnit training and mentoring services.  These services are very much tailored to project-specific needs, class size, and duration, rather
messageBody:
kanti gowr wrote:

> Hi
> Our QA Team is interested to get training in JUNIT(Our Application is J2EE
> based),Can we know any institute which charges reasonable rates
>

I provide on-site JUnit training and mentoring services. These services are
very much tailored to project-specific needs, class size, and
duration, rather than a one-size-fits-all training course.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
http://www.clarkware.com
